workflow: Signup with a new user and log in

trace.thought: The goal is to sign up a new user and log in. The current page is the home page, so I need to click on the 'Sign up' button to create a new user account.

The goal is to sign up a new user and log in. The previous action was clicking the 'Sign up' link, which has brought us to the signup modal. Now, I need to fill in the username and password fields to create a new user.
The goal is to sign up a new user and log in. I have already clicked the 'Sign up' button and filled in the username. The next step is to fill in the password field.
The goal is to sign up a new user and log in. I have already clicked the 'Sign up' button and filled in the username and password fields. Now I need to click the 'Sign up' button to submit the form.

The goal is to sign up a new user and log in. I have already clicked the 'Sign up' button and filled in the username and password fields. Now I need to click the final 'Sign up' button to submit the form and create the new user account.

The goal is to sign up a new user and log in. I have already filled the username and password and clicked the signup button twice. Now I need to handle the alert that appears after clicking the signup button.
